introduction.html:div: This document delineates the OSEE milestone and release schedule from its current state through graduation from incubation to a mature Eclipse project which will be version 1.0.

release_deliverables.html:div: OSEE will provide both IDE-based client and server update sites. The server includes the ability to serve a web based client.

preamble.html:div: Approximate dates for the later milestones have not yet been determined.

milestone.html:div: First stable milestone build for graduation review

target_environments.html:div: In addition to continuing support for Windows, Solaris, and Linux, effort is being made to fully support versions of OS X that can support Java 6.

internationalization.html:div: Due to community demand, internationalization efforts have already begun, with tentative support for the German locale.

compatibility_with_previous_releases.html:div: Beginning with the 0.9 milestone, robust export/import utilities will be provided for migration to newer database schemas.

preamble.html:div: The bulk of the OSEE capabilities needed for OSEE 1.0.0 have been developed, but much remains to make OSEE consumable and mature.
